inclusion.criterion: Histological or cytological proof of hepatocellular or biliary tract carcinomas
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: not amenable to curative resection or transplantation

inclusion.criterion: Prior cancer treatment completed at least 30 days prior to being registered for protocol therapy and recovered from the acute toxicity effects of the regimen.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients may have had radiofrequency ablation, cryosurgery or embolization, but must have documented progressive disease with the involved lesion, or at least one previously untreated lesion.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients must agree to abstain from frozen or fresh grapefruit or grapefruit juice for 5 days prior to, and during treatment.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Written informed consent and HIPAA authorization for release of personal health information.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Age ≥ 18 years at time of consent.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: No previous treatment with EGFR inhibitors.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: No symptomatic brain metastasis. A subject with prior brain metastasis may be considered if they have completed their treatment for brain metastasis, no longer require corticosteroids, and are asymptomatic.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: No Child-Pugh B or C liver cirrhosis.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: No active corneal erosions or history of abnormal corneal sensitivity test.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: No history of aneurysm or arteriovenous malformation.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: No hemorrhage/bleeding event > CTCAE Grade 3 within 30 days prior to begin registered for protocol therapy.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: No clinically significant infections as judged by the treating investigator.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: No condition that impairs patient's ability to swallow whole pills.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 55 year old man with lower urinary tract symptoms. He has no previous treatment with EGFR inhibitors and no symptomatic brain metastasis.
